Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Combine the cake flour, sugar, and baking powder. Add the water and evaporated milk, stirring until well combined. Incorporate the eggs and butter or margarine into the mixture.
Bake in the preheated oven until the tops are golden and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 18 to 25 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine the grated carrots, sugar, and eggs, mixing until well combined. Add the vegetable oil and stir until smooth.
